summary: Death Necromancer Armor from the game Darksiders 2
descriptionHtml:
Death Necromancer Armor


This mod adds a new armor to Skyrim.
Death Necromancer armor from the game Darksiders 2.
Four armor parts: head, body, gloves, boots.All textures 2048 px.

You got one light armor for warrior type players.
The armor is forgeable , upgradable, enchantable like any other armor.
The level is dragonscale armor but can vary depending on your current level when you forge it.

You have two esps in the archive, one allows to forge the armor from the beginning without the required "dragon armor " perk, the other  requires the perk to be unlocked.

For the no perk choose "DS2 Necromancer Armor NP" (No Perk).
or the perk one choose "DS2 Necromancer Armor P" (Perk).

You also got one "clothes" version of the armor without armor stats for mage players.
Whatever esp you choosein this case, you only need the items to craft the armor at the tanning rack in the misc section.

For both light armor and mage clothes, you got the option to forge the mask alone.
The mask comes in two version, one with glowing eyes the other without.
Choose  the normal mask for the glowing version and the mask  with NG (No Glow) for the Nno glow version.
Update on 11/06/2013:

These esps fix the wrong path for the clothe version of the armor, pointing to the dark brotherhood gloves.
Just Download the V2 version and replace the esps with the one in this archive.
As always only use one of them.This is not risky to have both but it will clutter your smithing menu.
Have fun and sorry for the inconvenience.
AthenaX

Update on 09/20/2013:

The mod has been upgraded to display Skyrim body textures for people who don't want to look like a dunmer.
Just forge the armor parts named armor SB and head SB.Both clothes version and armor version are available.
The head part is like a circlet and will display your head part and hair.The body remains the same but displays the normal skin texture or any skin texture you have installed for the Skyrim male body.

There is also a little fix for 1st person models not liking to the good models.

Installation:
NMM ready.Just download with NMM and install with it.Check the esp you want.Perk or no Perk. NOT BOTH!!!

Uninstall:

use NMM.

Recommanded mods but not required:

If you want to look like the pictures,bigger hands, wider shoulders, smaller head and taller, 
I recommand you to download the Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951

and the RANs Enhanced Character Edit Enhancer by Ran46
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35713//?
These are mostly for Women character enhancement but the limbs sliders also work for men.

Just be sure to use a custom skeleton like XPMS by XP32( BBP or TBBP ready)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800//?

For the showracemenu crashing use Showracemenu Precache killer by Kapaer.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33526//?
